short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate Finnish words to English and add them to your personal dictionary and train.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Personal Dictionary

Description
An extension that allows users to translate selected words and add them to a personal dictionary. Extension supports Finnish, English and Russian languages. The extension also provides options for viewing, editing, deleting, and practicing with saved words.

Main Features
- Completely free, no registration or subscriptions required.

- Translate and Save Words: Highlight a word on any web page to translate it and save it to your dictionary.

- Supports Finnish, English and Russian languages

- Search for Word Suggestions: Receive word suggestions when highlighting a word.

- View Dictionary: Access your dictionary to view saved words.

- View Wiktionary Content: Search for any word in Wiktionary.

- Edit or Delete Words: Modify or remove words in your dictionary.

- Export Dictionary: Export your dictionary to a file. The format is compatible with Anki cards.

- Train Words: Test your knowledge by practicing with the words.

- Sync Across Devices: Your dictionary syncs across devices using chrome.storage.

How to Use:

- Translate and Save Words: Highlight a word on any web page, and a popup with translation options will appear. You can click "Save to Dictionary" to add the word to your dictionary, change the provided translation, or search for a similar word in the Wiktionary database.

- View Dictionary: Click the extension icon and select "My Dictionary" to view and manage saved words. Click "Details" to search Wiktionary content for any word.

- Export Words: Click the "Export" button to download your dictionary in .txt format. Words are separated by tabs.

- Practice Words: Click the extension icon and select "Train Words" to start a practice session.
